spiritsExplanation:
This workout video is strongly aligned with the 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit, as evidenced by the title 'Race Winning Intervals Workout', which suggests high intensity and competitive focus. The description further emphasizes this by referring to the session as a 'tough workout', and user comments mention the workout being 'brutal' and 'sweat-inducing', underscoring its demanding nature, thus warranting a high score of 0.9 for this spirit.

Additionally, the 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit is also relevant, albeit to a slightly lesser extent (score 0.7), due to the methodical approach implied by the mention of 'intervals'—a structured form of training—and the instructor-led format indicated by 'Matt Stephens instructs you'. This suggests a focus on technical precision and structured progress.

Other spirits such as 'Sport & Agility' could apply due to the cycling context, but given the indoor nature and structure of the session, it's less pronounced. No significant evidence supports the inclusion of 'Flow & Rhythm', 'Soothing & Restorative', or 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirits.
